issue.title: [Java] Avro adapter support convert nullable value
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6035](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6035). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
A  specific Avro unions type(has two types and one is null type) could convert to a nullable ArrowVector.

For instance, ["null", "string"] could represented by a VarcharVector which could has null value.
